turns.content: One tweet with three reflective questions on evaluating personal impact

"Take a moment to reflect on your impact:

1. How have your actions and words contributed to or dismantled systems of oppression?
2. In what ways have you used your privilege to uplift marginalized voices and support justice?
3. How can you continue to grow and learn in your journey towards being an ally and advocate for justice and equity?"
One tweet with three tactics on how to integrate DEI into their organizational strategies

"Here are three ways to integrate DEI (diversity, equity, and inclusion) into your organizational strategies:

1. Make DEI a core part of your mission and values, and embed it into all aspects of your work.
2. Develop and implement comprehensive DEI policies and practices, including training and resources for employees.
3. Engage with and actively seek input from diverse stakeholders, including employees, customers, and community members."
One 280 character tweet in why leaders need to create cultures of belonging for their teams

"Leaders, it's crucial to create cultures of belonging for your teams. When people feel seen, heard, and valued, they are more likely to bring their whole selves to work and feel a sense of belonging. This leads to increased collaboration, creativity, and productivity. Plus, it's the right thing to do. #inclusion #diversity"
